snippet: With the help of Maggie Steffens, the United States women’s water polo team defeated Spain and filled a void that some of its members had been feeling.
abstract: United States women's water polo team wins a 8-5 gold medal victory over Spain.
lead_paragraph: With the help of Maggie Steffens, the United States women’s water polo team defeated Spain and filled a void that some of its members had been feeling.

headline.seo: Women’s Water Polo Gold Goes to U.S. as It Beats Spain
headline.main: Fourth Time Brings Title for United States
headline.print_headline: Fourth Time Brings Title for United States
